name: Intro
text: We’ve searched the whole island but we can’t find her. Our boat’s still here so the only place she’d be is the 5 Trials. But she was always so insistent on keeping her distance from it, preferring to stay at the camp. So we don’t understand why she’d be in there.

The others are starting to get paranoid. John claimed we’re “being watched”. We got into a fight and afterwards he left the island with the others. I chose to stay behind; I not leaving until I can find Geoff and Lucy. Though I suppose I won’t be here much longer either. There’s not much else I can do… Except…
